title: For all those that think bronze is some sort of special ELO Hell
body:
Watch this through to the end.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4lRjmLCnQ5o

replies.body: I like the wood division adventure videos more, if you havnt seen any of them, watch them.... there piss funny

Agreed, though they are a different subject matter, Disco Heat's (for those that don't know Disco Heat is the username of the guy in the video i posted, his name backwards is his channel.) Videos are more a showing of how toxic the community is, the wood division are a showing of how trash some players are on this game.
Please, quit this game, let it die. Once this game dies other games will get a large influx of players and better games will emerge, League of Legends is rubbish.

League of Legends as a game is fine, most of the problems with League are the community rather than the game, sure there are a fair few balance issues here and there (i'm looking at you Mundo) but generally speaking they make the game change, and personally i am someone who likes (and has a decent ability to) adapt to the game changes.
Since you obviously don't like LoL, why you wasting your time browsing though the forums? Think you need some "support", buddy
If this game's so trash, why you wasting your time browsing through the forums. I think you need Support
at this point i get more pissed off about someone saying anywhere other than oce is the worst region in the world

I like that guy's vids.

he can be a bit of a dick in the comments though.

LOL I've played with PWN7, poor guy must get sick of this kind of crap (it's happened to us numerous times....having said that, he's abused me too so...)

Welcome to High Platinum Gameplay!
